Paranoid PD: When you interact with others, how do you feel about their intentions? (options: They are usually friendly / They might be trying to deceive me) Choose They are usually friendly if you believe most people mean well. Choose They might be trying to deceive me if you feel like others have hidden motives.
They might be trying to deceive me

When you meet someone new, what do you think? (options: They seem friendly / They might have hidden motives) Choose They seem friendly if you feel comfortable with them. Choose They might have hidden motives if you feel cautious about their intentions.

When you hear a rumor about yourself, how do you feel? (options: It's probably untrue / Someone is trying to harm me) Choose It's probably untrue if you think it's just gossip. Choose Someone is trying to harm me if you believe there's a plan against you.
Someone is trying to harm me

When someone tries to reassure you, how do you feel? (options: I feel better / I still have my doubts) Choose I feel better if you usually trust what they say. Choose I still have my doubts if you find it hard to believe them.

When you notice someone acting friendly, what do you think? (options: They genuinely like me / They have an ulterior motive) Choose They genuinely like me if you feel safe. Choose They have an ulterior motive if you feel cautious.

When you are around others, how do you feel? (options: I stay aware of my surroundings / I feel comfortable and relaxed) Choose I stay aware of my surroundings if you often watch for anything unusual. Choose I feel comfortable and relaxed if you trust the people around you.
I stay aware of my surroundings

When someone hurts you, how do you feel about forgiving them? (options: I can move on after some time / I can't trust them again) Choose I can move on after some time if you believe healing is possible. Choose I can't trust them again if you feel they intended to hurt you.
